  }} 'Critical Reviews in Microbiology' is an international, peer-reviewed
  academic journal that publishes comprehensive review articles covering all
  areas of medical microbiology. Areas covered by the journal include
  bacteriology, virology, microbial genetics, epidemiology, and diagnostic
  microbiology. It is published by Informa.
